metadata.name: Brushed by chance
metadata.description:
At certain construction sites, where a lot of paint work happens, workers tend to wipe their paint brushes on dispensable surfaces. These brush strokes of convenience often create an attractive confluence of colours and compositions!


Collection: UNWANTED  
Edition: 1/1

About the Artist: Dhara Kabaria, a designer based in India, working in the area of circularity and building with waste. In this series of artworks, she explores the starkly vivid visual splendor of the unwanted.

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries, and essays by the holder of the NFT, as long as the creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with the creator.
